```{r initial, include=FALSE}
#install.packages("data.table")
#install.packages("tidyverse")
#install.packages("dplyr")
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
library(tidyverse)
library(data.table)


raw_data <- read.csv("gss.csv")
raw_data <- raw_data %>% mutate(bin_evermarried = if_else(ever_married == "Yes", 1, 0))

focused_data <- raw_data %>% select("bin_evermarried", "sex", "age", "education", "regilion_importance") %>% filter(!is.na(sex), !is.na(age), !is.na(education),
                                                                                                 !is.na(regilion_importance), !is.na(bin_evermarried))

first_logit <- glm(bin_evermarried ~ sex + age + education + regilion_importance, data = focused_data, family = "binomial")
summary(first_logit)

```
